attributes.additional_details:
Save our Centre. Sowerby Bridge Centre faces closure!
This local community centre is multipurpose, welcoming and engaging. It offers opportunities to young people and a range of community groups.  Those currently using the centre include: youth groups, a rock and music school and disabled young people. The disabled young people come from all over Calderdale to be “different” but be together.
Please help us save our centre so we can continue to learn new skills, build friendships and sustain our community.
